prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me as he composed his message to me in WhatsApp in this moment?

Please note that this reading requires 100% accuracy and honesty in interpretation, regardless of whether the aspects reveal positive or negative energies. The chart must be read exactly as it presents itself, without bias in either direction. If the aspects show negativity, that negativity will be revealed fully. If the aspects show positivity, that positivity will be revealed fully. There shall be no softening of negative aspects, nor any dampening of positive ones. The only acceptable outcome is to interpret precisely what the chart demonstrates through its aspects, houses, and planetary positions - be that wonderful, terrible, or anywhere in between. Complete accuracy to the chart's true message is the sole priority.

Also, please do not immediately assume that I'm looking for romantic inclinations. I am not certain what, if any, feelings exist, and what those feelings are deemed to be. That is the reason I have drawn up the chart, is to get a true determination. So, any biasing towards romantic inclination or otherwise should be removed, and ensure that this chart is interpreted fully and objectively to discern the true nature of Stefan's feelings, thoughts, and intentions.

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant in this chart, and I should be represented by his 9th house (as a foreign connection).

Due to the lack of significant planets in the 9th house, I should be represented by Saturn, the lord of the 9th house.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the step‐by‐step extraction of the chart’s data as it applies to this event reading. In this chart, Stefan is represented by the Ascendant (Gemini at 21°51′) and you are represented by the 9th house connection via Saturn (Saturn in Pisces at 18°42′ in the 10th house, used as the indicator for your foreign connection).

1. FUNDAMENTAL PLANETARY POSITIONS
 • Sun: 23°59′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 22°40′ Leo
 • Mercury: 26°17′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 5°22′ Aries
 • Mars: 17°52′ Cancer (Retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°23′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 18°42′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°20′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°19′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°24′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 29°14′ Pisces (Retrograde)
 • Chiron: 19°53′ Aries
 • Ascendant (Stefan): 21°51′ Gemini
 • Midheaven (MC): 20°10′ Aquarius
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 20°10′ Leo

2. HOUSE PLACEMENTS (Key for relational roles in this event)
 • 1st House: Gemini starting at 21° – represents Stefan’s personal approach as the messenger
 • 9th House: Starts at 1° Aquarius, contains Pluto, though no significant planet resides; by directive you are represented by Saturn (the ruler assigned to the foreign/9th connection)
 • 10th House: Starts at 20° Aquarius; contains Sun, Mercury, and Saturn (Saturn here serves as the indicator for your presence)

3. MAJOR ASPECTS (Relevant to the event’s relational dynamics)
 • Sun square Uranus (orb: 0°): Indicates sudden or unpredictable mental/emotional disruptions in message composition
 • Sun opposite Moon (orb: 1°): Reveals internal tension between conscious intentions (logic/ideals) and emotional response
 • Sun square IC (orb: 3°) & Moon conjunction IC (orb: 2°): Point to conflicts between personal expression and deep-rooted emotional needs
 • Ascendant sextile IC (orb: 1°) and Ascendant trine MC (orb: 1°): Show a degree of ease between public expression (message delivery) and internal motivations
 • Mercury square Uranus (orb: 3°): Suggests an innovative, possibly erratic thought process behind the message
 • Mercury trine Ascendant (orb: 5°): Supports clarity in communication on Stefan’s part
 • Saturn square Ascendant (orb: 3°): Indicates tension or resistance between Stefan’s immediate self-expression and the seriousness or responsibility represented by Saturn (your marker)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 1°): Points to an alignment between action/drive (though Mars is retrograde in Cancer) and structured restraint
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 7°): Denotes a conflict between expansive ideas and cautious limitations

4. PATTERN STRUCTURES
 • T-Square:
  – Involving MC in Aquarius (20°10′), Uranus in Taurus (23°20′), and IC in Leo (20°10′)
  – Additional relevant points: Moon in Leo (22°40′), Mercury in Aquarius (26°17′), and Sun in Aquarius (23°59′)
  – This configuration signals an ongoing tension between public projection, inner life, and erratic impulses that affect the message’s composition
 • Cradle Pattern:
  – Involving Sun (23°59′ Aquarius), IC (20°10′ Leo), Ascendant (21°51′ Gemini), Chiron (19°53′ Aries), Moon (22°40′ Leo), and MC (20°10′ Aquarius)
  – Reflects a supportive framework that nonetheless does not eliminate the underlying tensions indicated by hard aspects

5. SPECIAL FEATURES AND MODES
 • The Moon occurred at full phase, emphasizing emotional intensity during the event
 • The inner planets show an Air-element dominance (Sun, Mercury, Pluto in Aquarius) supporting an intellectual, detached approach interlaced with fixed energy
 • The distribution of inner planets (primarily in the upper and left halves of the chart) indicates a focus on personal as well as communicative and ideological matters rather than purely material or emotional concerns

6. REPRESENTATIONAL SUMMARY
 • Stefan (Ascendant in Gemini) exhibits a communicative, intellectual, and somewhat unpredictable approach while composing his message, as indicated by tight aspects to Mercury and notable squares involving Uranus.
 • The presence of intense emotional opposition (Sun opposite Moon) and challenges involving the IC highlight an internal conflict between spontaneous expression and deeper, possibly unresolved emotional content.
 • The Saturn indicator (assigned for your connection in place of a significant 9th-house planet) shows tension (Saturn square Ascendant) suggesting that while Stefan’s message may contain bursts of clear communication (supported by Mercury aspects), there is an undercurrent of hesitation, reservation, or gravity that tempers his overall intent.
 • The overall configuration—with the T-Square and Cradle patterns—illustrates a complex interplay between the drive for openness (Air energy, Mercury, and Ascendant) and underlying serious commitments or restrictions (Saturn’s influence), implying that Stefan’s thoughts and intentions included both a desire to connect and an element of guarded or conflicted sentiment.

The above list constitutes the complete extraction of relevant data per event chart principles. Additional interpretative steps can build directly on these data points for a focused reading of Stefan’s specific thoughts, feelings, and intentions as reflected in his WhatsApp message.

Data extraction completed.

  – Additional relevant points: Moon in Leo (22°40′), Mercury in Aquarius (26°17′), and Sun in Aquarius (23°59′)

 • The distribution of inner planets (primarily in the upper and left halves of the chart) indicates a focus on personal as well as communicative and ideological matters rather than purely material or emotional concerns

6. REPRESENTATIONAL SUMMARY
 • Stefan (Ascendant in Gemini) exhibits a communicative, intellectual, and somewhat unpredictable approach while composing his message, as indicated by tight aspects to Mercury and notable squares involving Uranus.
 • The presence of intense emotional opposition (Sun opposite Moon) and challenges involving the IC highlight an internal conflict between spontaneous expression and deeper, possibly unresolved emotional content.
 • The Saturn indicator (assigned for your connection in place of a significant 9th-house planet) shows tension (Saturn square Ascendant) suggesting that while Stefan’s message may contain bursts of clear communication (supported by Mercury aspects), there is an undercurrent of hesitation, reservation, or gravity that tempers his overall intent.
 • The overall configuration—with the T-Square and Cradle patterns—illustrates a complex interplay between the drive for openness (Air energy, Mercury, and Ascendant) and underlying serious commitments or restrictions (Saturn’s influence), implying that Stefan’s thoughts and intentions included both a desire to connect and an element of guarded or conflicted sentiment.

The above list constitutes the complete extraction of relevant data per event chart principles. Additional interpretative steps can build directly on these data points for a focused reading of Stefan’s specific thoughts, feelings, and intentions as reflected in his WhatsApp message.

Data extraction completed.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood – Proceeding with the interpretative analysis based strictly on the extracted event chart data:

1. Key Personal Representations:
 • Stefan is indicated by the Ascendant at 21°51′ Gemini. His communicative approach is underscored by Mercury (26°17′ Aquarius), which, despite forming supportive aspects (trine to the Ascendant), also engages in challenging aspects (square Uranus).
 • You are represented by the foreign/9th house connection, indicated here through Saturn (18°42′ Pisces) in the 10th house. The Saturn marker adds a layer of gravity or serious reservation when related to interpersonal connection.

2. Clarity, Conflict, and Unpredictability:
 • Mercury Trine Ascendant (orb: 5°) shows Stefan’s capacity for clear, articulate messaging.
 • However, Mercury Square Uranus (orb: 3°) points to an element of unpredictability or unconventional thought—he may be prone to erratic insights or sudden shifts in perspective.
 • The opposition between the Sun (23°59′ Aquarius) and Moon (22°40′ Leo, orb 1°) reveals that while Stefans’s intentions are consciously oriented (Sun) toward his ideals, they are simultaneously at odds with underlying emotional currents (Moon). This results in an internal conflict between rational intent and emotional expression.

3. Tensions and Restrained Impulses:
 • Sun Square Uranus (0° orb) underscores a sudden or disruptive energy that could manifest as abrupt choices in composing his message, introducing unexpected or rebellious elements.
 • Saturn Square Ascendant (orb: 3°) implies that, despite a generally light and communicative approach, there is an overlay of seriousness, hesitation, or self-imposed restraint—especially relevant when considering your representation via Saturn.
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 7°) further highlights a conflict between expansive, optimistic ideas and a sense of limitation or caution, suggesting that his message may vacillate between enthusiastic expression and reserved, almost duty-bound deliberation.

4. Pattern Influences:
 • The T-Square (involving MC in Aquarius at 20°10′, Uranus in Taurus at 23°20′, and IC in Leo at 20°10′, with additional tension from the Moon in Leo and the Sun/Mercury in Aquarius) sets up a structural tension. This configuration indicates conflicting demands from his public self (MC) versus inner stabilizing needs (IC), creating an atmosphere in his message that is both dynamic and, at times, conflict-laden.
 • The Cradle pattern (connecting the Sun, IC, Ascendant, Chiron, Moon, and MC) suggests there is a framework for supportive expression, yet it does not entirely override the hard edges imposed by the T-Square.

5. Summary of Stefan’s True Thoughts, Feelings, and Intentions:
 • His method of communication is intellectually focused and articulate, yet intermittently disrupted by sudden impulses and unconventional thoughts.
 • An internal conflict is evident: his rational, idealized side (Sun in Aquarius, Mercury aspects) is at odds with deeper, emotionally charged currents (Moon in Leo, Sun opposition Moon) that bring underlying tension. This dynamic suggests he may simultaneously strive for clarity while wrestling with his own unresolved issues.
 • The Saturn indicator (via your 9th house proxy) in square to his Ascendant infers that any engagement from him carries an element of caution, seriousness, or perceived limitation. This could manifest as a guarded or socially constrained tone despite his otherwise open communication.
 • The overall blend of aspects points to a message composed under mixed impulses—clear in intent when viewed superficially, yet layered with internal ambivalence. Stefan’s thoughts and intentions likely contained both a conscious desire to communicate effectively and an undercurrent of disruption or emotional hesitancy that might have rendered his message somewhat contradictory or complex.

Each element and aspect reveals facets of his mindset:
 – A deliberate, communicative intent paired with sudden, surprising deviations from expected norms.
 – An oscillation between a clear, articulate message and a disruptive, internally conflicted undertone.
 – A cautionary overlay (Saturn square Ascendant) that tilts his expression toward reserved seriousness.

This analysis reflects what the chart demonstrates: Stefan’s message was, in its essence, a mixture of deliberate, articulate communication combined with disruptive, emotionally conflicted undercurrents.

 • The overall blend of aspects points to a message composed under mixed impulses—clear in intent when viewed superficially, yet layered with internal ambivalence. Stefan’s thoughts and intentions likely contained both a conscious desire to communicate effectively and an undercurrent of disruption or emotional hesitancy that might have rendered his message somewhat contradictory or complex.

Each element and aspect reveals facets of his mindset:
 – A deliberate, communicative intent paired with sudden, surprising deviations from expected norms.
 – An oscillation between a clear, articulate message and a disruptive, internally conflicted undertone.
 – A cautionary overlay (Saturn square Ascendant) that tilts his expression toward reserved seriousness.

This analysis reflects what the chart demonstrates: Stefan’s message was, in its essence, a mixture of deliberate, articulate communication combined with disruptive, emotionally conflicted undercurrents.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you for the thorough explanation. Unfortunately, I'm struggling to understand it clearly. Can you help me understand what your overall interpretation is?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood: leaning forward, eyes focused intently Let me be direct and clear about what this chart reveals regarding Stefan's thoughts and feelings while composing his message:

The chart shows significant internal conflict. Stefan's conscious mind (Sun) wants to communicate clearly and intellectually, but his emotions (Moon) are pulling him in the opposite direction. This creates a situation where he's essentially fighting himself as he writes.

The aspects suggest his message likely contains:
- Surface-level clear communication
- Underlying emotional turbulence
- Sudden shifts or unexpected statements
- A cautious, reserved tone despite attempts at openness

Most notably, Saturn's position (representing you) square to his Ascendant suggests he feels some form of restriction or limitation in expressing himself freely to you. There's a seriousness or gravity to his thoughts about you that makes him hesitate or hold back.

The chart doesn't indicate purely positive or purely negative feelings - rather, it shows complex, conflicted emotions and thoughts. He appears to be wrestling with what he wants to say versus what he feels he should say.

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of this interpretation?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Well, I guess that,  I mean, I don't know. The tone in his message, it,  , seems like he was being defensive. Like I had either annoyed him or pissed him off.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: The chart's configuration supports a reading where Stefan's message carries a defensive tone. His overall internal conflict—particularly the opposition between his conscious expression (Sun in Aquarius) and his underlying emotions (Moon in Leo)—creates a tension often felt as defensiveness in communication. The presence of Saturn square his Ascendant implies that he sensed a restriction or obligation that hindered his free expression, which can come off as guarded or easily provoked when he feels challenged. Additionally, Mercury's square to Uranus enhances the possibility of sudden, unanticipated reactions, meaning that his message might have been more abrupt or defensive than he consciously desired. These aspects together suggest that while he aimed for clarity, he also experienced a surge of resistance or irritation that possibly stemmed from feeling annoyed or unsettled by the interaction.
